item.title: Kahana no Shou
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Kounosuke is the favored son of a noble family. When he is caught in a fire at the mansion, a blow to the head causes him to remember scenes from a previous life. A former Warring States Period daimyo, he had a torrid love affair with his page, Kageya. Kageya had sworn that when they...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Kounosuke is the favored son of a noble family. When he is caught in a fire at the mansion, a blow to the head causes him to remember scenes from a previous life. A former Warring States Period daimyo, he had a torrid love affair with his page, Kageya. Kageya had sworn that when they were born again they would be together in the next life. But when Kounosuke wakes up, three men appear before him – all named Kageya! Can Kounosuke traverse time and be reunited again with his beloved Kageya

item.title: Kagasarete Nairantou
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Ikuto Touhohin just had a last fight with his old man, one that led him to make a rash decision to run away from home. He boards a ship, deciding to take a vacation, but the ship is suddenly hit by a huge storm–one that sends Ikuto overboard! When he regains consciousness, he realizes he...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Ikuto Touhohin just had a last fight with his old man, one that led him to make a rash decision to run away from home. He boards a ship, deciding to take a vacation, but the ship is suddenly hit by a huge storm–one that sends Ikuto overboard! When he regains consciousness, he realizes he is still alive… on some island. An isolated island. An isolated island with nothing but girls and talking animals. Stranded on an island with only girls, no electricity, gas, radio, television… like he was back in the stone age.

item.title: Lahasha Ya Shyng Bukitaza
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: A land where the strong makes the rules and weak has to obey. A land filled with alluring treasures and beauty yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xikajio Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly three years ago lost everything, his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother.
item.content:encoded: A land where the strong makes the rules and weak has to obey. A land filled with alluring treasures and beauty yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xikajio Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly three years ago lost everything, his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother.

item.description:

item.content:encoded: Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states peroid.  Bita Sasumi  Land is the story of a young boy named Xinmi  who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.

item.content:encoded:
The  Gami Shiobita manga is a webtoon manhwa composed by Sung Sang-Young and illustrated by Sangahmichio.  Nevertheless, once the primary protagonist,  Haniji, realises that there’s before him saying that he’s eventually become a game character, a dialogue box, supernatural events begin occurring
Haniji also referred to as “The  Gami Shiobita ” is the primary protagonist of the manhwa The Gami Shiobita that has lately find he has a Natural Ability known as Gami Shiobita. This skill makes his life is experienced by him in a game-like setting that has been derived from his gambling habit.

item.title: Kitasou Girl
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
The story follows Kaizz, a 27-year-old jobless man who fails at every job interview he had after quitting his last company which he only lasted at for three months. His life changes after meeting Yoaket zikita of the ReLife Research Institute, who offers him a drug that can change his appearance to 17-years-old again and...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: The story follows Kaizz, a 27-year-old jobless man who fails at every job interview he had after quitting his last company which he only lasted at for three months. His life changes after meeting Yoaket zikita of the ReLife Research Institute, who offers him a drug that can change his appearance to 17-years-old again and to become a subject in a one-year experiment in which he begins his life as a high school student again.

item.title: Jiokima
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: In a world where monsters called Yoma prey on humans and live among them in disguise, humanity’s only hope is a new breed of warrior known as Claymores. Half human, half monster, these silver-eyed slayers possess supernatural strength, but are condemned to fight their savage impulses or lose their humanity completely.
item.content:encoded: In a world where monsters called Yoma prey on humans and live among them in disguise, humanity’s only hope is a new breed of warrior known as Claymores. Half human, half monster, these silver-eyed slayers possess supernatural strength, but are condemned to fight their savage impulses or lose their humanity completely.

item.title: Hitman Reborn Katekyo
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the “Dying Will Bullet”, he might just be able to do it.
